name: d2l-table
description: Mixins and CSS for applying table styles

scripts.test: concurrently -p name -n lint:js,lint:wc,galen,wct "npm run test:lint:js" "npm run test:lint:wc" "npm run test:galen:local" "wct --skip-plugin sauce"
scripts.galen:local:run: npm run galen -- test test/acceptance/check-local.test.js --htmlreport reports/d2l-table
scripts.galen:sauce:run: npm run galen -- test test/acceptance/check-sauce.test.js --htmlreport reports/d2l-table -p4 -DUSERNAME=$SAUCE_USERNAME -DACCESS_KEY=$SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY -DTUNNEL_IDENTIFIER=$TRAVIS_JOB_NUMBER -DNAME=$TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG -DBUILD=$TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER
scripts.dump:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run dump:galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:sauce: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:sauce:run"

author: D2L Corporation
